subtab.title: Featured Product
subtab.description: The SuiteCommerce Featured Product extension lets you add a section to highlight a product on your website using Site Management Tools.

featuredproduct.fieldset.title: Field Set ID
featuredproduct.fieldset.description: Enter the Field Set ID that the extension will use with the Item Search API. If you do not enter a Field Set ID, the extension will use the Details field set.
